posts.post_content:
Posted By: Mark
Looking for Camnitz, Lobert, Paskert, Joss, McIntyre (#28), Jordan, Murray, Bescher, Chance, Bridwell and Lennox.

Posted By: Steve Murray
No idea what to ask. Take a look and see if you might be able to use it. If so make a suggestion. I am open to trades though T3 is not one of my collecting interests.

Checklist back. Reasonably clean card. Other than the miniscule ding in the lower right corner no creases. No paper loss.

jacklitsch@comcast.net

[IMG]http://i52.photobucket.com/albums/g5/jacklitsch1/T%20Cards%20Raw/MurrayT3.jpg[/IMG]

Posted By: Mark
Steve - email sent.

Posted By: DMcD
Hi Mark- I have a very clean PSA4 Bridwell (TR back).  I'll shoot some fotos when the sun comes up and send 'em to you.
David McDonald
